item.title: web api là gì ?
item.description: API stands for Application Programming Interface A WebAPI is an application programming interface for the Web A browser API can extend the functionality of a web browser A server API can extend the functionality of a web server API are constructs made avaible in programming languages to allow developers to create complex functionality more easily. They abstract more complex code away from you, providing some easier syntax to use in its place.
